value.title: Reuse M code (M functions) created by others easily
value.excerpt: In today's video I am collaborating with Imke Feldmann to bring you the best that M or Power Query has to offer.  We will show you how you can easily re-use M functions in your reports. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
